description: This file defines API views for a note management system using Django REST Framework. It includes a health check endpoint and a ViewSet for CRUD operations on notes, with Swagger documentation annotations.

classes.name: NoteViewSet
classes.description: A ViewSet for performing CRUD operations on notes, supporting list, create, retrieve, update, partial update, and delete actions with Swagger documentation.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all notes, with Swagger documentation.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new note, with Swagger documentation.

methods.name: retrieve
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific note by ID, with Swagger documentation.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update all fields of a note, with Swagger documentation.

methods.name: partial_update
methods.description: Handles PATCH requests to partially update a note, with Swagger documentation.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to delete a note by ID, with Swagger documentation.
